data.text: @RSPCA_official @Natures_Voice London Wildlife Protection have been notified and managed to get him home safely
@StuartEdwards @Natures_Voice Hi Stuart - thanks so much for looking out for this pigeon. Could you please contact your local wildlife rescue in the first instance: https://t.co/ZrUyFIlQ7w
@StuartEdwards Hi Stuart. This isn't something we can help with I'm afraid. We're a conservation charity so do not have any facilities to rescue sick or injured wildlife. The RSPCA are your best bet.
